tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP love) (S (VP (VBG waking) (PRT (RP up)) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN sound)) (PP (IN of) (S (VP (VBG screaming) (NP (NNS children)))))))))) (. .)))
